properties.areaDesc: Franklin, MO; Montgomery, MO; Gasconade, MO; Osage, MO; Lincoln, MO; Warren, MO
properties.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued January 10 at 5:58PM CST until January 10 at 6:45PM CST by NWS St Louis MO
properties.description:
The National Weather Service in St Louis has issued a

* Severe Thunderstorm Warning for...
Southwestern Lincoln County in east central Missouri...
Southeastern Montgomery County in east central Missouri...
Northwestern Franklin County in east central Missouri...
Southeastern Osage County in central Missouri...
Warren County in east central Missouri...
Gasconade County in east central Missouri...

* Until 645 PM CST.

* At 558 PM CST, a severe thunderstorm was located near Linn, moving
northeast at 65 mph.

HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail.

SOURCE...Radar indicated.

IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees.

* Locations impacted include...
Washington, Warrenton, Wright City, Hermann, New Haven, Linn,
Gerald, Davis, Marthasville, Jonesburg, Truesdale, Hawk Point,
Innsbrook, Swiss, Mount Sterling, Treloar, Drake, Rich Fountain,
Gasconade and Berger.

This includes Interstate 70 in Missouri between exits 183 and 199.

This also includes Deutschheim Historic Site.
properties.instruction:
Remain alert for a possible tornado! Tornadoes can develop quickly
from severe thunderstorms. If you spot a tornado go at once into the
basement or small central room in a sturdy structure.

For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a
building.
